Why is the appearance of the title bar (mainly the border and the close/maximize/minimize) buttons of the RibbonWindow looking like Windows98 sytle in XP?

I would expect it to look XP style.

Is this normal behavior?

RibbonWindow should support Windows XP look and feel in XP.
It only defaults to the Classic look and feel when the System Theme is not correctly detected.

Can you provide a little more information about the exact way that you are creating the RibbonWindow and what your system settings are?

The Classic window chorme is the default fall back if the RibbonWindow doesn't have the correct look and feel implemented.
Media Center has its own look and feel for window chrome hence RibbonWindow falls back to the default.

The Windows XP Media Center look and feel is not supported right now.
